objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Special Gift • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 68 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant product banner features a soft, gradient background design transitioning from blush peach to rose pink, enhanced with delicate geometric lines, circles, and floral-inspired decorative shapes, giving it a feminine and modern feel. At the center, a clean white circular highlight frames an image of the featured product (id: "product_image"). Positioned above the product, the text layers "heading" and "subheading" introduce the product type and collection name, using a bold serif and stylish decorative font respectively. To the right of the product, a circular design element houses the prominently styled price text (id: "price"). Below, the "description" text layer outlines key selling points with dot separators. At the bottom, a rectangular button with contrasting background includes the "cta" text to encourage user interaction. 
 
**Color Palette**:  
- Soft Peach: #FFE8E6  
- Rose Pink: #F5C8C2  
- Accent Rose: #E5A79F  
- Deep Burgundy: #8B1E3F  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings adorned with sparkling crystals and a soft rose gold metal base. The main color palette includes Rose Gold (#F7ACA9), Clear Diamond White (#FFFFFF), Soft Blush Pink (#FADADD), and Light Silver (#D8D8D8). The rose gold coating is used to structure and accentuate floral and petal shapes, blending softly into the blush pink stone centerpiece. The shimmering white crystals provide brilliant highlights, creating contrast and visual appeal. The interplay of soft metallic and gemstone tones exudes luxury and femininity, making these hues ideal for an advertisement that conveys elegance, sparkle, and sophistication.
